<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Upsert Modfile Cooks"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/mods/{mod-id}/cooks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update or insert modfile cooks. Successful request will return a `204 No Content` response.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"mod-id","in":"path","description":"Mod id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"title":"Upsert Modfile Cooks Request","required":["cook_uuid","modfile_id","platform","status","timestamp"],"properties":{"cook_uuid":{"description":"The UUID of a cook.","type":"string","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"modfile_id":{"description":"The id of the source modfile.","type":"integer","format":"int32"},"platform":{"description":"The platform being cooked for.","type":"string","example":"ps5"},"status":{"description":"The status of the cook.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1},"timestamp":{"description":"Unix timestamp of the cook update.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1499841487},"metrics":{"description":"The metrics data of the cook.","properties":{"total_job_time_seconds":{"description":"Total job time in seconds.","type":"integer"},"download_time_seconds":{"description":"Download time in seconds.","type":"integer"},"upload_time_seconds":{"description":"Upload time in seconds.","type":"integer"},"file_decompression_time_seconds":{"description":"File decompression time in seconds.","type":"integer"},"file_compression_time_seconds":{"description":"File compression time in seconds.","type":"integer"},"cook_time_seconds":{"description":"Cook time in seconds.","type":"integer"}},"type":"object"},"logs":{"description":"The logs of the cook.","type":"array","items":{"properties":{"level":{"description":"The log severity level. May be one of: 0 (Trace), 1 (Debug), 2 (Information), 3 (Warning), 4 (Error), 5 (Critical), 6 (None).","type":"integer"},"message":{"description":"The log message itself.","type":"string"},"is_private":{"description":"If the log is private and should only be viewed by game moderators.","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}},"virtual_machine_type":{"description":"A unique identifier to differentiate the virtual machine used.","type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"No Content"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
